title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/ramburger-donaldmike.html
notes:
Ralph Ramburger, last seen in QUIT MONKEYING AROUND, 
returns to face "Donald Mike". 


"Donald Mike" also recently faced off against Lonslo Tossov in 
SOCIAL ENGINEERING, with about as much success.


Comrade Ralph is a close friend of business tycoon Chester Nutley, last seen in NOT QUITE COMPREHENDIBLE.

messages.body:
Starring
- posing as expatriate Icelander looking for investment opportunities
vs.
 
- posing as expatriate Ukrainian with investment opportunities

to have a good relationship with me thanks waiting for your response soon

know how to make a guy feel special!!! Thank you for well noting my note and
now I may tell you that i am from the Reno Nevada area of the U.S.A. and i very
much enjoy the
gambling and the party atmosphere and the alcoholic beverage consumption. i
often win much monies and am interested in finding a good time partner to have
a good relationship with who may also enjoy the gambling life in Reno Nevada
with me. perhaps you can share this and we can have a good relationship
together!


Ralph

messages.body:
This sounds like an interesting plan is there anything i
can do to help you quit the London?
you can come invest with me in the United States
and we can be business partners and start a good relationship business with our
monies here in Reno Nevada U.S.A.


I am from the Ukraine
and have been very successful here in the United
 States and there is much money to be made in the Reno Nevada
area. if you would be interested in a good relationship business opportunity
let me know how we can arrange this.


Ralph

messages.body:
Thanks my dear am very grateful to meet
someone like you.The most important thing about this our relationship is trust
and sincere it will surely help us in future.I want us to do business together
as a brothers


Am the only Child of my Parents although
my Dad is dead my Mum she is an old woman 87yrs old she lives in Iceland anyway
before the death of my Late Father him work in one of the Asian country
Malaysia as a Contractor.


According to his bank manager there in
Malaysia he has an account there in Malaysia which is $120,000,00 One hundred
and Twenty Thousand Dollars Only there in one of the Bank in Malaysia the name
of the bank is Hong Leong Bank Malaysia and i would like you to contact the
bank on my behalf so that them shall transfer this fund into your bank account
there in United states for our investment there in USA thanks waiting to hear
from you soon


Yours sincerely


Mr Donald

messages.body:
Oh this is very interesting as $120,000,00 is a good amount
of monies and will compliment nicely the amounts of monies I have in my
accounts here in Reno Nevada! 


I am sorry to hear that your Dad is Dead but good to hear
that your mother is an old woman 87 years of age and is living in Iceland
and that they worked together in the Asian Country of Malaysia.


If I can help you move the $120,000,00 to my
account that would be a very good relationship deal to do we can work together
and handle these monies like brothers. Once the money is moved we can have a
relationship here in Reno Nevada
and have fun times gambling in the casinos here together like two brothers
living in Reno Nevada! With the money we can invest in a
large living space and live like kings in Reno
 Nevada and all others will envy
us for our money and good relationship status.


Let me know how we can transfer
the $120,000,00 so we can begin our relationship and have a good time
gambling and drinking alcoholic beverages here in Reno Nevada!


Your Brother in Money,
Ralph

Good evening my dear thanks for your
reply kindly contact the this person them will direct you how to Transfer this
fund into your bank

messages.raw:
Donald Mike

Date: Fri, 9 Mar 2012 08:12:37

Good evening my dear thanks for your reply kindly contact the this person them will direct you how to Transfer this fund into your bank account there in United States contact the person of Ms Azlina Binti Fadli.Tel Number is +60163479236 this is the email addressremittance.deptsbk@gmail.com

Thanks waiting to hear from you soon

Donald

The telephone number is a mobile phone in Malaysia: 60-16-347-9236.
So "Donald" has a bag man in Malaysia.
Or, maybe HE is in Malaysia - "Ms Fadli" never actually appears in this scambait.
Bag man? the gentle reader asks. Do you mean someone who picks up money? No one's asked for money!
Read on. And keep a firm hand on your wallet.

plenty to live very well here, and I want to be able to share these riches with

when one is a very wealthy man!!

can get my information collected!


Your brother in money,
Ralph

messages.subject: Bank Transfer For Funds of Money in Reno Nevada
messages.body:
Donald Mike,


Here is the message I sent to the
banking associate I hope you are of reliable nature and we can work together to
complete this transfer and you and I will soon be dining on fine shrimp
cocktails and drinking here in my new home in Reno Nevada. I will be sure to
prepare your favorite drink for your arrival if you would tell me what it is
you would like to drink to celebrate the completion of the transfer and the
sharing of the good times money!


Your brother in money,
Ralph



Date: Mon, 12 Mar 2012 10:55:15 -0700

Hello Ms Azlina Binti Fadli,

I have been instructed
to contact you by my dear friend Donald Mike. We are great friends and are like
brothers and I am receiving a transfer of money from Donald Mike into
my bank account in Reno Nevada that I shall use for my gambling and
alcoholic beverage consuming lifestyle. The amount will be $120,000,00 is US
funds, so prepare your account managers to enter such a large number as they
may have not yet seen into their computerized banking system for the transfer.


Please forward the
instructions that are needed to provide the transfer of money so that the money
transfer may be completed between us.


Professionally,
Ralph

Sent: Monday, March 12, 2012 1:30 PM

I will be sure to prepare your favorite drink for your arrival if you would tell me what it is you would like to drink to celebrate the completion of the transfer and the sharing of the good times money!

Your brother in money,
Ralph

*Message Sent to .The Bank.*

To: remittance.deptsbk@gmail.com

Hello Ms Azlina Binti Fadli,

I have been instructed to contact you by my dear friend Donald Mike. We are great friends and are like brothers and I am receiving a transfer of money from Donald Mike into my bank account in Reno Nevada that I shall use for my gambling and alcoholic beverage consuming lifestyle. The amount will be $120,000,00 is US funds, so prepare your account managers to enter such a large number as they may have not yet seen into their computerized banking system for the transfer.

Please forward the instructions that are needed to provide the transfer of money so that the money transfer may be completed between us.

Professionally,
Ralph

How are you doing today i hope you are

Meanwhile i want to have your telephone
number and house address there in United states as soon as am through there in
Dubai i will meet you there in United states


Try and keeping in contact with bank as
soon as the bank has transfer the money into your bank account try and update
me okay.


Meanwhile if there,s any transfer charges
kindly pay for it thanks waiting to hear from you soon


Donald

How are you doing today i hope you are fine i have very urgent contract negotiation in Dubai i will been leaving London this afternoon to fly to Dubai.

Meanwhile i want to have your telephone number and house address there in United states as soon as am through there in Dubai i will meet you there in United states

Donald

messages.body:
Oh my this is very good news that you are able to quit the London and go to
Dubai.
I hope very much that the contract negotiation goes well and you can get even
more money to allow for our wealthy lifestyle to be even more luxurious. We
shall soon be smoking cigars and relaxing in a hot tub with grand piles of
money all about us! To make our lifestyle even more luxurious, I will soon
exchange some of the money you are transferring for gold coins so that we
may have mountains of coins and even fill a large pool with them so that we may
swim in wealth and truly be like kings of Money!!!


All this is such good news I am going to
go out and celebrate like I have never celebrated before let the good times
roll this is all lucky number 7's for me!!!


I am staying at the Silver Legacy Resort Casino on North Virginia Street
in Reno Nevada.
I have a special extra luxury suite here and it is all ready for party
lifestyle and soon we shall be kingly men of Reno Nevada!
I just moved in, you may be able to call me using the hotel desk number. I will
be out celebrating every day because of this good fortune so you can leave a
message if you need to notify me about travel arrangements but email will work
fine for us to arrange our dealings and make the money exchange and soon live
like money brothers!


Now my dear friend Donald Mike I am off to the Casino for a
great long party of alcohol and great lucky winnings unlike Reno has never
seen! I will see you soon and
do not worry I will take good care of the large money pile you will be
entrusting me with my close brother.


Your Money Brother Ralph

messages.body:
Thanks for your mail When is the bank
going to transfer the fund into your bank account there in United States.and if

messages.raw:

Date: Wed, 14 Mar 2012 22:49:18

Thanks for your mail When is the bank going to transfer the fund into your bank account there in United States.and if there,s any transfer charges kindly pay for it okay take note of it thanks

Scam-o-note: gentle reader please understand that the transfer charge IS the scam. There is no "$120,000,00 One hundred and Twenty Thousand Dollars Only" to be transferred.
Ralph is to be fooled into sending a money order to cover the 'transfer charge'. If a second scammer plays "banker" and picks up the money order, "Donald" gets a "sharing percentage." If Donald works alone, he gets it all.
Or 100% of zero, because...

messages.body:
Donald Mike,


Thank you for the information I
have completed the bank transfer with the help of one Barrister Mobutu and I
now have possession in the amount of $100,000,00 dollars US funds!
The bank withheld $20,000,00 for a conversion fee from the foreign account
the money amount was moved from but they said that was the standard
amount withheld for transfers like this one so I agreed hopefully
this is acceptable to you. 


Thank you sir Donald Mike for
the money deal, I am now be able to live like a king here in Reno Nevada, and
have already been having a great time with the money I love money! I will
continue to hold a room for you at the hotel for when you are done with your
business in Dubai
and there is a bar full of drinks for you to enjoy when you arrive!


Thank you again sir for the
money, this is the best thing that has ever happened to me I am the winner of
life in money!!!


Your money
brother Ralph


*THE END*

 



 




scamorama main street 
* 
get booked 
*
messages.raw:
Ralph Ramburger

Ralph ends with the classic technique of the imaginary rival scammer.

Sent: Monday, March 19, 2012 5:04 PM

Donald Mike,

Thank you for the information I have completed the bank transfer with the help of one Barrister Mobutu and I now have possession in the amount of $100,000,00 dollars US funds! The bank withheld $20,000,00 for a conversion fee from the foreign account the money amount was moved from but they said that was the standard amount withheld for transfers like this one so I agreed hopefully this is acceptable to you.

Thank you sir Donald Mike for the money deal, I am now be able to live like a king here in Reno Nevada, and have already been having a great time with the money I love money! I will continue to hold a room for you at the hotel for when you are done with your business in Dubai and there is a bar full of drinks for you to enjoy when you arrive!

Thank you again sir for the money, this is the best thing that has ever happened to me I am the winner of life in money!!!

Your money brother Ralph

*THE END*
